description: Erection of outbuilding at the end of the garden.

decision_conditions: The proposed outbuilding is considered not to fall within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class E(e), (f) and (h) of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended) as the proposed development would exceed 2.5m in height within 2m of the boundary, it has not been demonstrated that the eaves would not exceed 2.5m in height and the proposals would include the provision of a verandah.
